The staff were very quiet in manner and there weren’t that many smiles on offer so I can see why other reviewers might have perceived them to be a little ‘miserable’. That aside, I found them helpful when I needed assistance. The hotel has a 24 hour front-desk so arriving late at night is not a problem. Two restaurants I would recommend would be Attic (over the Nike shop) on La Rambla and Taxidermista on Placa Reial. The food in both restaurants was very good and reasonably priced. Service was also good. Menus available in English in both restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but shocking staff!”
Reviews.Author: Leo65
Reviews.Content: I have just spent a weekend at the Mason Castilla in Barcelona. This hotel whilst good value for money, nice terrace for b/fast and has average rooms - has the most unfriendly and unhelpful front desk staff. It was impossible to get them to book a restaurant, and if you do not speak spanish, this is a difficult task! Also, we tried to find out what time the bus left to take us back to the airport but again, they would not call the bus company. Basically, the staff at the front desk do not understand or practice GOOD SERVICE or even basic service for that matter. Any reqeust, even checking in or retrieving a key was dealt with in an icy manner and I never once saw a smile !

Reviews.Title: “Miserable staff, fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: JMM1980
Reviews.Content: My mum and I stayed in Hotel Meson Castilla for four nights in August. The rooms were clean and adequate. Very impressive maid service with sheets and towels changed daily. The location of the hotel is excellent as you can reach La Ramblas and Catalunia square by foot within minutes. The reception staff however were miserable and did not go out of their way to make you feel welcome. On our first evening the bathroom became flooded after heavy rain coming through the patio floor and when we asked for more towels to mop it up, they suddenly lost all ability to speak or understand English (amazingly the next night when we had no problem for them to deal with they understood everything we said perfectly!!!) We had no problems with noise at all as most of the nightclubs etc seemed to be on their Summer breaks. I would recommend the hotel for people visiting Barcelona who want a central, clean and small hotel. Please be careful with the street crime in Barcelona, we had our purse stolen on day two and when we went to report it at the police station there were lots of people there in the same situation.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!!!”
Reviews.Author: pam2393
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in the best place as the highstreet shops and La Rambla are just around the corner.There are a lot of small side streets full of shops around the hotel. It does get quite noisy as it is in a busy, run down place and doesnt help with there being a night club just outside the hotel, but being on the 5th floor did help. The hotel is very clean however the pictures are slightly misleading. A couple of the staff were miserable and give you one word answers but the rest were fine. The safes are kept downsairs, a deposit of 25 euros has to be given upfront and it will be returned to you when you give back the key. Drinks from the mini bar cost 1.80 euros. Overall nice hotel based in the center but not for those who like a quiet atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “Excellent find”
Reviews.Author: stanstedguesthouse
Reviews.Content: My friend and myself stayed here for 1 night on the 8th June and what a great find. Very good location with a very Spainish feel about it. The rooms had everything we wanted, Bed's very comfortable, Shower excellent and the air conditioning was perfect. Breakfast included in the price with a very good selection, you can sit inside or outside. They was very helpful, when we checked in they supplied maps, tours information and highlighted that you are in a city and you should be aware of your surroundings, with simple steps for safety. They directed us to some good places to eat. We was able to leave our luggage and keep our safe desposit box until the evening of the 9th, when we went back to collect our luggage they ordered us a taxi to go to the airport which was there in 5 mins. Excellent stay which made a one night stay seem like we had been pampered for a week.

Reviews.Title: “very good value”
Reviews.Author: LancashireLassie
Reviews.Content: Very good value for what we paid and what we wanted. Central, round the corner from the Ramblas. Good choice at breakfast - friendly and helpful staff. We didn't find it noisy at all.

Reviews.Title: “Too noisy to sleep!”
Reviews.Author: jwlanclos
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at this hotel if you want to sleep at all. We stayed three nights and were exhausted at the end of the stay. Not only did the street noise keep you awake but the walls are paper thin. The rooms are very small and definitely two star. The staff is not very helpful. The one great thing about the hotel was the location and the dining area and breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Barcelona off Las Ramblas”
Reviews.Author: alexandrab
Reviews.Content: Stayed with my 75 year old Mother in hotel for 4 nights. The room was clean w/ a terrace w/ small table topped with plant and chairs. The 24/7 staff was fabulous, English speaking and knowledgeable when asked questions about where to eat, etc. The hotel room was very quiet, terrace sunlit and warm, breakfast buffet, very good. Location is impeccable & safe, close to everything,
